page.title: 18People in Stanwell cont.
page.content:
{Reverand David Pemberton}
The vicar of St Mary's Church. Rev.Pemberton gets up at 7 o'clock.(He doesn't like getting up!) He looks at his post. He goes into the Church at 9 o'clock and meets with the Deaconess, Mrs Wareham. They say morning prayers. Then he usually goes home to write letters. In the afternoon he visits people who are sick or in trouble. In the evening he goes into the church to say evening prayers, and say Thankyou. In the evenings there are often meetings or confirmation classes. If he is free he sometimes watches television. He has a day off on Friday. He wears special clothes for his job with a white collar. People call this special collar a "dog collar". It helps us recognise a vicar.
